data.eml:eml: Satrapisternitens Bickhardt, 1912: redescription and tentative phylogenetic placement of a mysterious taxon (Coleoptera, Histeridae, Saprininae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lackner, Tomas (2016): Satrapisternitens Bickhardt, 1912: redescription and tentative phylogenetic placement of a mysterious taxon (Coleoptera, Histeridae, Saprininae). Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 63 (1): 1-8, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.6363, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.6363
